article_metadata.news-keywords: Ed, Hernandez, drug prices, Medi-Cal, CalPERS, cost, pharmaceuticals, Legislature
article_metadata.description: This trend is a costly burden on all of us, making it crucial that we understand what’s behind these exploding prices. The public and policymakers need greater insight that will allow us to identify strategies to ensure prices do not threaten our ability to access life-saving treatments.
article_metadata.title: California needs sunshine on rising drug prices | The Sacramento Bee
